column4: EiffelStudio bugs
Description
Opening 29 development windows at the same time kills EiffelStudio
Create an inheritance cycle, recompile, display an invalid flat in the editor, pick a class in the error, drop in the editor => weird things happen
The new feature wizard doesn't work during debug sessions
Clean up the code of EB_DEVELOPMENT_WINDOW::set_stone
Some complex calling structures are not pickable in formats (such as a.b(create{TOTO}.make(titi.tata.tutu)) or ("This").works)
The callers format is messed up by Precursors
When a feature makes a call in a precondition, it is displayed twice in the callers
Really hide the implementation of precompiled classes when it is required (including descendants)
When searching for the comments of an attribute, the search goes one line too far
When a feature was undefined, the written-in class still is the class of the parent feature
When implementing a deferred feature with a feature inherited from another branch, the other feature is not detected as an implementer
The editor doesn't support more than 32000 lines of text (scrollbars jump to the top)
Writing 256 times "io.putstring ("A message");" on the same line messes up the editor
When dropping a dragged selection at the start of a line, EiffelStudio is frozen
After recompiling it is possible to edit library classes
When pasting a text that is larger than the current text, the end of the text is not displayed
Problem in pick-and-drop when pushing mouse buttons in a given order
Pressing Ctrl+Space when no completion is available makes the redo command button sensitivity toggle
Pressing Page up/Page down while the cursor is not visible scrolls from the cursor instead of from what is visible
When there are several locals on the same line only the first one is taken into account by the completion
Modifications in the user-defined string do not seem to be taken into account
column9: closed(we now say that the application needs to be restarted)

column4: There are sometimes 2 breakpoints at the same line, which causes strange behaviors
Implement a deferred feature without preconditions in a descendant and add a precondition => breakpoints are messed up
t: EV_TREE_ITEM; n: EV_TREE_NODE; create t; n?=t.item => crash at run-time
Freeze, run, cancel, end freeze, run => EiffelStudio is frozen
When clicking the remove all breakpoints button and then pressing Cancel the output displays the current breakpoints
When a compilation is interrupted (or fails) during degree 6, the command line arguments are not used if the project is run.
After an error "local has same name as feature", the returned line index is sometimes wrong (it is if the error message includes "character position")
Named string constants are not considered as constants from the feature {TOTO} point of view and cause VSTA2 errors
When importing metrics, the multi-column list is shrunk
Edit a class, rename it in its diagram in the same window, crash
If you add a link while they are hidden, they become visible but the tooltip is invalid
Using a clickable editor in the profiler is very bad: Ctrl F crashes, pick and drop makes the profiler disappear, no way to sort the lines
In the documentation generation, make sure there are no unwanted "
